caption.p: Weekly number of news articles and (A) influenza-like illness incidence per 10,000 inhabitants in general practitioner (GP) practices, (B) of patients consulting their GP for pneumonia per 10,000 inhabitants, (C) severe acute respiratory infections incidence per 10,000 inhabitants in Jeroen Bosch Hospital, (D) number of deaths, and (E) number of influenza diagnoses reported in the virological laboratory surveillance during the 2017/2018 influenza season in the Netherlands. ILI: influenza-like illness; SARI: severe acute respiratory infections.
